name: Neon City Runner (Standalone)
description:
Rush through 25 levels of procedurally generated neon city dreamscape, avoiding perils and picking up power-ups to boost your speed and jump capabilities. How long can you last?

Move fast, or be consumed!

Neon City Runner was created for #CYBERPUNKJAM 2014.

All art, music, and Programming by Jared Saizdelamora, Tastes like Future! Games 2014.

*Please note : This is the standalone version of Neon City Runner for PC/Mac. You can play it in the browser  HERE *
